    SafeSql.query(Connection connection, SqlConsumer<? super Statement> settings, SqlFunction<? super ResultSet,? extends T> rowMapper)
    Executes the encapsulated SQL as a query against connection, using settings (can be set via lambda like stmt -> stmt.setMaxRows(100)).

    <T> Stream<T>
    SafeSql.queryLazily(Connection connection, SqlConsumer<? super Statement> settings, SqlFunction<? super ResultSet,? extends T> rowMapper)
    Executes the encapsulated SQL as a query against connection, with settings (can be set via lambda like stmt -> stmt.setFetchSize(100), and then fetches the results lazily in a stream.
